text.div:
Generated Narrative: ValueSet R5-v2-0316-for-R4

This value set expansion contains 7 concepts.

SystemVersionCodeDisplay
http://terminology.hl7.org/CodeSystem/v2-03162.3.0  FYes, patient is a documented donor, but documentation is not on file
http://terminology.hl7.org/CodeSystem/v2-03162.3.0  INo, patient is not a documented donor, but information was provided
http://terminology.hl7.org/CodeSystem/v2-03162.3.0  NNo, patient has not agreed to be a donor
http://terminology.hl7.org/CodeSystem/v2-03162.3.0  PPatient leaves organ donation decision to a specific person
http://terminology.hl7.org/CodeSystem/v2-03162.3.0  RPatient leaves organ donation decision to relatives
http://terminology.hl7.org/CodeSystem/v2-03162.3.0  UUnknown
http://terminology.hl7.org/CodeSystem/v2-03162.3.0  YYes, patient is a documented donor and documentation is on file

name: R5V20316ForR4
title: Cross-version ValueSet R5.Hl7VSOrganDonor for use in FHIR R4
description: This cross-version ValueSet represents content from `http://terminology.hl7.org/ValueSet/v2-0316|2.0.0` for use in FHIR R4.
purpose:
This value set is part of the cross-version definitions generated to enable use of the
value set `http://terminology.hl7.org/ValueSet/v2-0316|2.0.0` as defined in FHIR R5
in FHIR R4.

The source value set is bound to the following FHIR R5 elements:
* 

The following concepts are not included in this cross-version definition because they have valid representations
* _no concepts_

Following are the generation technical comments:

FHIR ValueSet `http://terminology.hl7.org/ValueSet/v2-0316|2.0.0`, defined in FHIR R5 does not have any mapping to FHIR R4
